memory: Short-term gains from maximizing catch can lead to catastrophic consequences for the lake's long-term viability.
Our individual desires to maximize income are directly linked to the long-term health and sustainability of the lake, requiring a shift in mindset.
Short-term profit maximization without considering long-term sustainability will inevitably lead to the collapse of the lake and our fishing livelihood.
Short-term profit maximization can lead to catastrophic consequences for the entire fishing community and the lake's ecosystem.
Short-term gains from maximizing catch can quickly lead to catastrophic consequences for the lake's ecosystem.
